mapper.select: select a.id,a.title,a.create_time,a.update_time from article a,user u where a.user_id = u.id and a.user_id = #{userId} and a.type = 0 and a.title like concat('%',#{name},'%') order by a.update_time desc
select a.id,a.user_id,a.author,a.content,a.description,a.cover,a.create_time,a.update_time,a.title,a.type,a.status from article a where a.id = #{articleId} and a.status = 1

select a.id from article a
,article_tag at
and a.type = 1 and a.status = 1
and at.article_id = a.id and at.tag_id = #{tag}
